verses.verse: A <S%H7390>soft<s%> <S%H4617>answer<s%> <S%H7725>turns<s%> away <S%H2534>wrath<s%>: but <S%H6089>severe<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> stir <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>.
The <S%H3956>tongue<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> uses <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> <S%H3190>rightly<s%>: but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> pours <S%H5042>out<s%> <S%H200>foolishness<s%>.
The <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> are in every <S%H4725>place<s%>, <S%H6822>beholding<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> and the <S%H2896>good<s%>.
A <S%H4832>wholesome<s%> <S%H3956>tongue<s%> is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>: but <S%H5558>perverseness<s%> in it is a <S%H7667>breach<s%> in the <S%H7307>spirit<s%>.
A <S%H191>fool<s%> <S%H5006>despises<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H4148>instruction<s%>: but he that <S%H8104>heeds<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> is <S%H6191>prudent<s%>.
In the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H2633>treasure<s%>: but in the <S%H8393>revenues<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H5916>trouble<s%>.
The <S%H8193>lips<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H2219>disperse<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>: but the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the foolish does not <S%H3684>so<s%>.
The <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: but the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of the <S%H3477>upright<s%> is his <S%H7522>delight<s%>.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: but he <S%H157>loves<s%> him that <S%H7291>follows<s%> after <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.
<S%H4148>Correction<s%> is <S%H7451>severe<s%> unto him that <S%H5800>forsakes<s%> the <S%H734>way<s%>: and he that <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> shall <S%H4191>die<s%>.
<S%H7585>Hell<s%> and <S%H11>destruction<s%> are before the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: how much more then the <S%H3826>hearts<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>?
A <S%H3887>scorner<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> not one that <S%H3198>reproves<s%> <S%H3212>him<s%>: neither will he go unto the <S%H2450>wise<s%>.
A <S%H8056>merry<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> makes a <S%H3190>cheerful<s%> <S%H6440>favor<s%>: but by <S%H6094>sorrow<s%> of the <S%H3820>heart<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> is <S%H5218>broken<s%>.

The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of him that has <S%H995>understanding<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>: but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H7462>feeds<s%> on <S%H200>foolishness<s%>.
All the <S%H3117>days<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> are <S%H7451>evil<s%>: but he that is of a <S%H2896>merry<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> has a <S%H8548>continual<s%> <S%H4960>feast<s%>.
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is <S%H4592>little<s%> with the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> than <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H214>treasure<s%> and trouble with <S%H4103>it<s%>.
<S%H2896>Better<s%> is a <S%H737>dinner<s%> of <S%H3419>herbs<s%> where <S%H160>love<s%> <S%H75>is<s%>, than a stalled <S%H7794>ox<s%> and hatred with <S%H8135>it<s%>.
A <S%H2534>wrathful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> stirs <S%H1624>up<s%> <S%H4066>strife<s%>: but he that is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H8252>appeases<s%> <S%H7379>strife<s%>.
The <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H6102>slothful<s%> man is as a <S%H4881>hedge<s%> of <S%H2312>thorns<s%>: but the <S%H734>way<s%> of the <S%H3477>righteous<s%> is made <S%H5549>plain<s%>.
A <S%H2450>wise<s%> <S%H1121>son<s%> makes a <S%H8055>glad<s%> <S%H1>father<s%>: but a <S%H3684>foolish<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H959>despises<s%> his <S%H517>mother<s%>.
<S%H200>Wickedness<s%> is <S%H8057>joy<s%> to him that is <S%H2638>destitute<s%> of <S%H3820>wisdom<s%>: but a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H8394>understanding<s%> <S%H3212>walks<s%> <S%H3474>uprightly<s%>.
Without <S%H5475>counsel<s%> <S%H4284>purposes<s%> are <S%H6565>disappointed<s%>: but in the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H3289>counselors<s%> they are <S%H6965>established<s%>.
A <S%H376>man<s%> has <S%H8057>joy<s%> by the <S%H4617>answer<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: and a <S%H1697>word<s%> spoken in due <S%H6256>season<s%>, how good is <S%H2896>it<s%>!
The <S%H734>way<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> is <S%H4605>above<s%> to the <S%H7919>wise<s%>, that he may <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7585>hell<s%> <S%H4295>beneath<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5255>destroy<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H1343>proud<s%>: but he will <S%H5324>establish<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of the <S%H490>widow<s%>.
The <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked<s%> are an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: but the words of the <S%H2889>pure<s%> are <S%H5278>pleasant<s%> <S%H561>words<s%>.
He that is <S%H1214>greedy<s%> of <S%H1215>gain<s%> <S%H5916>troubles<s%> his own <S%H1004>house<s%>; but he that <S%H8130>hates<s%> <S%H4979>gifts<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>.

The <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1897>studies<s%> to <S%H6030>answer<s%>: but the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5042>pours<s%> out evil <S%H7451>things<s%>.
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7350>far<s%> from the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>: but he <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.
The <S%H3974>light<s%> of the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H8055>rejoices<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%>: and a <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H8052>report<s%> <S%H1878>makes<s%> the <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H1878>fat<s%>.
The <S%H241>ear<s%> that <S%H8085>hears<s%> the <S%H8433>reproof<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H3885>stays<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H2450>wise<s%>.

He that <S%H6544>refuses<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> <S%H3988>despises<s%> his own <S%H5315>soul<s%>: but he that <S%H8085>hears<s%> <S%H8433>reproof<s%> <S%H7069>gets<s%> <S%H3820>understanding<s%>.
The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>; and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3519>honor<s%> is <S%H6038>humility<s%>.
